actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to make loans available for small businesses suffering economic injuries as the result of the disruption of operations and services of public utilities.

summary.text: Makes loans available, under the Small Business Act, to assist any small business concern in continuing or establishing its business if the Administrator of the Small Business Administration determines that such concern has suffered economic injury as the result of the disruption of operations and services of public utilities occurring on or after February 1, 1975.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Small Business Act to make loans available for small businesses suffering economic injuries as the result of the disruption of operations and services of public utilities.
